flawed_nl_solution:
When Jayson is 10 his dad is 10 x 4 = <<10*4=40>>40 years old.
His mom is 40 - 2 = <<40-2=38>>38 years old.
When Jayson is born, his mom is 38 - 10 = <<38-10=82>>82 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 82. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
